/* GameRecorderMapper.findAllCandidates */ SELECT GJP.GAME_JOIN_PLAYER_SEQ , GJT.GAME_SEQ , GJT.HOME_AWAY_CODE , GJT.TEAM_SEQ , GJP.USER_SEQ , GJT.TEAM_NAME , GJP.NAME AS USER_NAME , GJP.PLAYER_TYPE_CODE , GJP.POSITION_CODE , GJP.EMAIL , GJP.BACK_NUMBER FROM GAME_JOIN_TEAM GJT /* 경기참가팀 */ INNER JOIN GAME_JOIN_PLAYER GJP /* 경기참가선수 */ ON GJT.GAME_SEQ = GJP.GAME_SEQ AND GJT.HOME_AWAY_CODE = GJP.HOME_AWAY_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND GJT.GAME_SEQ = #{gameSeq} AND GJP.PLAYER_TYPE_CODE != '03' /* 선수유형코드 : 비회원 게스트(03)는 제외 */
AND GJT.HOME_AWAY_CODE = #{homeAwayCode}

/* GameRecorderMapper.findAllRecorders */ SELECT GRA.GAME_RECORD_AUTH_SEQ , ( SELECT TEAM_NAME FROM GAME_JOIN_TEAM WHERE 1=1 AND GAME_SEQ = GJP.GAME_SEQ AND HOME_AWAY_CODE = GJP.HOME_AWAY_CODE ) AS TEAM_NAME , U.USER_SEQ , GJP.GAME_JOIN_PLAYER_SEQ , GRA.GAME_RECORD_AUTH_CODE , U.NAME AS USER_NAME , U.POSITION_CODE , GJP.BACK_NUMBER , U.EMAIL , U.USER_ID FROM GAME_RECORD_AUTH GRA INNER JOIN GAME_JOIN_PLAYER GJP ON GRA.GAME_SEQ = GJP.GAME_SEQ AND GRA.USER_SEQ = GJP.USER_SEQ INNER JOIN USER U ON GRA.USER_SEQ = U.USER_SEQ WHERE 1=1 AND GRA.GAME_SEQ = #{gameSeq}
